translations: n.持票人；[建] 承木；[机] 托架；送信人；搬运工人；不记名（债券，股票等）

sentences.sentence: He was the U.S. flag bearer at the 1976 Montreal Games.
sentences.translation: 他是1976年蒙特利尔奥运会上美国的举旗手。

sentences.sentence: I am the bearer of good tidings.
I hate to be the bearer of bad news.
sentences.translation: 我讨厌当坏消息的捎信人。
